ResearchProjectDef.label: tranquilizers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of tranquilizers or other non-lethal weapons to temporarily inhibit some SCP's in order to further contain them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic containment crate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of specialized, powered containment vessels for all different kinds of SCP's.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced containment crate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of more advanced containment vessels for the harder to contain SCP's.

ResearchProjectDef.label: steel reinforced walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of concrete walls strengthened with steel rebar. Keeps some SCP's contained.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasteel reinforced walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of concrete walls strengthened with plasteel rebar. Keeps most SCP's contained.

ResearchProjectDef.label: security doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of reinforced doors to prevent SCP's from escaping containment whilst powered.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blast doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the construction of strong blast doors to prevent SCP's from escaping containment, even without power to the doors.
